name: MonoMoney
description:
MonoMoney lets you focus on the fun sides of MONOPOLY® by handling all the money transactions for you. This app keeps track of the accounts of up to 6 players so you can enjoy the game without having to worry about counting money anymore.

MonoMoney is an app that brings the classic board game MONOPOLY® into the 21st century by allowing you to play the game without cash. No more wasting time hunting in your couch cushions for that last dollar bill to cover your luxury tax. Now you can become a monopolist completely electronically! (Just like in the real world.)

Features:
• Add players by tapping the "+" button
• Transfer money by simply dragging between the players or the bank
• Quickly add $200 when a player passes "GO" by tapping on him
• Customise the currency, the quick add amount and the default balance in the settings
• Streamline your gameplay experience by handling all cash transactions within the app.
• Easily transfer cash by dragging and dropping between players or the bank. • Track money for up to 9 players.  • Extremely intuitive and user friendly.

(MONOPOLY® is a registered trademark of Hasbro, Inc. The developer of BoardBank is not affiliated with Hasbro and BoardBank is not associated with or endorsed by Hasbro.)
